description: Mike’s Mobile Screen & Chimney Service is the premier chimney sweep company in Sacramento. We offer a full range of chimney services to our customers including: chimney cleanings, inspections, repairs, rebuilds, masonry work and much more! According to the National Fire Protection Agency (Source: NFPA), a yearly inspection and cleaning should be done to maintain the fireplace in your home. A popular rule is that a cleaning is needed for every cord of wood burned or at least on an annual basis.

cards.title: Inspections
cards.text: Our fully trained technicians follow the standards of the CSIA (Chimney Safety Institute of America) and NFI (National Fireplace Association).

cards.title: Cleaning
cards.text: Mike's Mobile is Sacramento's premier chimney cleaning service. With every chimney sweep, we include a full level 1 chimney inspection report. To find out more click here

cards.title: Repairs
cards.text: We bring top-notch service to your home. We are a full service chimney company in Sacramento that can handle the following repairs: crown repair, heat damage to rear firebox wall, chimney liner, refractory panels, de-glazing and more!

cards.title: Accessories
cards.text: Mike's Mobile Screen & Chimney Service offers chimney caps, fireplace grates, glass door sets, radiant fire backs and much more! Please ask our trained technicians any questions you have and they can recommend what will work best for your home.

cards.title: Masonry Services
cards.text: Mike’s Mobile Screen & Chimney Service also offers masonry work that is not chimney or fireplace related. We are a full service masonry company in Sacramento. We specialize in the following: brick, block, stone, veneer, fireplace face/hearth, chimney stack rebuild, hardscapes, tuck-pointing, waterproofing and more!

cards.title: Dryer Vent Cleaning
cards.text: Dryer vents are a leading cause of residential fires. Clean up that honey-do list and get yours cleaned today!

services.title: Security Screen Doors and Windows
services.description: Mike's Mobile is your one-stop shop in the greater Sacramento area for all your home window and door security needs. Make sure you visit our showroom at 9912 Business Park Dr. Ste 175, Sacramento, Ca, 95827 to see all of our security products in person!

cards.title: Titan Security Screen Doors
cards.text: Mike's Mobile security doors are the best around. Fully customizable our security doors come in a full range for every price point or home type.

cards.title: Viewguard Security Screen Doors
cards.text: The Viewguard is by far our strongest and most popular security door. With a sleek design, quiet operation and a design that says "upscale" instead of "security" you can't go wrong with a viewguard security door!

cards.title: TRU-View Security Screen Doors
cards.text: The Tru-View is the little brother to the Viewguard security door. It offers the same great stainless mesh with a smaller frame and a more affordable price point. It's perfect for keeping dogs at bay.

cards.title: Sliding Security Doors
cards.text: Want to feel secure leaving your patio slider open all night to get that nice delta breeze? We have the perfect solution for you! Our sliding security doors offer legitimate security with a look that is completely unobtrusive.

cards.title: Vista Quick Escape Security Window Screens
cards.text: Need security but jail bars over your windows are not an option? Mike's Mobile has you covered! Our quick-release Vista security screens offer the ultimate in window protection and also meet all fire-egress code requirement.

cards.title: Vista Fixed Security Window Screens
cards.text: Vista Fixed Security Screens are an ideal solution to cover and protect non-opening windows. Our security screens can be installed on the interior or exterior and feature a concealed fastening system and blends with any architecture. Applications include: Schools, day care centers, psychiatric and detox centers, government buildings, military installations, adult care facilities and residential houses.

cards.title: Window Screen Repair
cards.text: Mike's Mobile is Sacramento's premier window screen service! We offer same-day, on-site service!

cards.title: Solar Screens
cards.text: Block out bugs or block the sun! Our Suntex Solar Screens block 80%-90% of the sun’s harmful UV rays.

cards.title: Sliding Screen Doors
cards.text: Mike's Mobile is unique in that we come out and build custom sliding screen doors on-site for a perfect fit!

cards.title: Swinging Screen Doors
cards.text: After we install your new, custom swinging screen door you will be wondering why you didn’t call us sooner!

cards.title: Retractable Screen Doors
cards.text: Mike's Mobile disappearing screen doors come in a variety of colors and we can even match the bottom track to match your threshold!

cards.title: Pet Doors
cards.text: Our high quality Pride pet doors can be built into your existing sliding screen door for a simple solution to this common problem.

cards.title: Garage Screen Doors
cards.text: The Lifstyle Garage Screen Doors converts your garage into a cool, bright, pest-free living space!

cards.title: Retractable Patio Awnings
cards.text: There is nothing like the relaxation and comfort a motorized retractable awning brings to your deck or patio.

cards.title: Drop Roll Sunscreens
cards.text: The Sunroll Retractacble Screen provides you with total vertical sun control of your covered outdoor space. Available in motorized or manual options, the Sunroll can be customized to fit your unique space with widths up to 24′ and heights up to 12′.

description: Now, with over 16 years in the fireplace business, Mike's Mobile has become the premier chimney sweep and repair company here in Stockton. We also service San Joaquin county and surrounding areas. Give us a call today for all of your chimney and fireplace needs!

services.title: Chimney Services
services.description: Now, with over 16 years in the fireplace business, Mike's Mobile has become the premier chimney sweep and repair company here in Stockton. We also service San Joaquin county and surrounding areas. Give us a call today for all of your chimney and fireplace needs!

cards.title: Inspections
cards.text: Mike's Mobile fully trained chimney technicians follow the standards of the CSIA (Chimney Safety Institute of America) and NFI (National Fireplace Association). We offer same-day digital reports for level I, II and III chimney inspections.

cards.title: Cleaning
cards.text: With every chimney cleaning, we include a same-day, digital Level 1 Inspection report.

cards.title: Repairs
cards.text: Mike's Mobile is Stockton's premier chimney service company. We can handle all chimney issues from start to finish including: crown repair, heat damage to rear firebox wall, chimney liner, refractory panels, de-glazing and more!

cards.title: Accessories
cards.text: Need fireplace or chimney related products in Stockton? Mike's Mobile has you covered - call today!

cards.title: Masonry Services
cards.text: Because of our exceptional quality, attention to detail and competitive pricing, our masonry services are in very high demand. Mike's Mobile is Stockton's premier masonry contractor.

cards.title: Dryer Vent Cleaning
cards.text: Appliance manufacturers recommend that dryer vents are cleaned annually to prevent fire and other hazards to your health and property. Mike's Mobile's dryer vent cleaning services not only benefit your safety, but can also make a world of difference for your clothing, utility use, and laundry routine.

services.title: Security Screen Doors and Windows
services.description: Mike's Mobile is your one-stop shop in the Stockton area for all your home window and door security needs. Check out our doors in person at 8130 Lorraine Ave., Suite 312, Stockton, Ca, 95210. See our steel doors for something ultimately customizable or our stainless mesh products for security without the bars!

cards.title: Titan Security Screen Doors
cards.text: Mike's Mobile has been Stockton's premier security door dealer for over 16 years. Please come in and check out our doors on display to see for yourself!

cards.title: Viewguard Security Screen Doors
cards.text: Now you can let the cool breeze in and keep intruders out without compromising the appearance of your home. Finally you can experience total security without resorting to bars or unsightly steel grills.

cards.title: TRU-View Security Screen Doors
cards.text: Tru-View doors offer security stainless steel mesh that offers a clear unobstructed view, while offering handsome good looks. This door has more ventilation than a conventional screen door and is also pet-safe to keep your animals inside.

cards.title: Sliding Security Doors
cards.text: Mike's Mobile sliding security doors offer smooth operation, great looks and premium security. The stainless steel weave looks like a screen and offers excellent airflow, 60% UV blockage and an unobstructed view.

cards.title: Vista Quick Escape Security Window Screens
cards.text: Say no to the old school wrought iron bars over windows for security. The Vista quick escape offers better security, way better looks and most importantly an escape route in case of emergency. On top of all that he stainless mesh cuts out 60% of UV rays to help your home stay cool for those hot Stockton summers.

cards.title: Vista Fixed Security Window Screens
cards.text: Vista Fixed Security Screens are the perfect solution to cover and protect your windows. Our security screens come in a variety of color options and feature a hidden fastening system. Applications include: Day care centers, psychiatric and detox centers, government buildings, military installations, schools, adult care facilities and residential homes.

services.title: Door and Window Screens
services.description: Whether your screens have been damaged by storms, pets or a variety of other reasons, Mike's Mobile has been providing new window and door screens to residential and commercial clients here in Stockton since 2002. Mike's Mobile has the perfect solution to repair or replace that damaged screen or door.

cards.title: Window Screen Repair
cards.text: If you are in Stockton, you can use our mobile service or come in to our screen shop! Whether you are getting your screens repaired or replaced Mike’s Mobile is at your service.

cards.title: Solar Screens
cards.text: Did you know that installing Solar Screens can save you money? Our solar screen material, Suntex, blocks 80-90% of the sun’s UV rays, lowering the temperature of your home while providing privacy for you and your family.

cards.title: Sliding Screen Doors
cards.text: Want a sliding screen door that stays on the track, rolls smooth, with all metal construction, and a pet proof screen? Call Mike's Mobile today, we have you covered!

cards.title: Swinging Screen Doors
cards.text: Need a swinging screen door for extra tall, extra wide or french doors? Mike's Mobile has you covered. All of our swinging screen doors are custom fit to your home.

cards.title: Retractable Screen Doors
cards.text: Want a screen that's there when you need it and gone when you don't? We have the perfect solution for you!

cards.title: Pet Doors
cards.text: Our pride pet doors come in a variety of sizes and colors!

cards.title: Garage Screen Doors
cards.text: The Lifestyle Garage Screen Door allows you to go from garage to an airy and pest-free space in a snap!

cards.title: Retractable Patio Awnings
cards.text: Keep your windows and doors shaded effortlessly! Mike’s Mobile installs motorized, retractable awnings with tons of options to fit your home!

cards.title: Drop Roll Sunscreens
cards.text: The Sunroll drop shade comes with a variety of screen options, custom sizes and comes motorized for ease of use!

description: At Mike's Mobile, we take pride in successfully solving your chimney needs in a cost effective and timely manner. Our goal is to make sure that your trust in us develops into a lifelong working relationship. From the office to the field, our employees have been trained by CSIA and NFI standards to give you superior customer service and high-quality workmanship. Chimney maintenance is important as chimneys vent hazardous gasses out of your home. Chimneys that are not annually swept and or inspected can potentially be a hazard to you, your family and your home. Maintaining the interior and exterior of your chimney will not only help protect you, your family and your home, but annual maintenance will aid in finding smaller problems before they develop into costly, more extensive repairs.

cards.title: Inspections
cards.text: Mike's Mobile offers level I, II, and III chimney inspections for your home. All of our technicians have been tested using CSIA and NFI guidelines for cleaning and inspecting. For more information about the levels of inspections, click here.

cards.title: Cleaning
cards.text: Chimney sweeps and inspections should be done annually, that is according to the NFPA. They are the leading authority on all chimney safety and regulations in the United States. We include a free level 1 inspection report with all of our chimney sweeps.

cards.title: Repairs
cards.text: We are a full service, chimney repair company in Antioch, California. Whether it's crown repair, a firebox rebuild or a full re-line, Mike's Mobile can tackle your chimney issues.

cards.title: Accessories
cards.text: If you need chimney or fireplace related products in Antioch, Mike's Mobile has you covered!

cards.title: Masonry Services
cards.text: Mike's Mobile is a full service masonry contractor in the Antioch area. Call us for a FREE quote today!

cards.title: Dryer Vent Cleaning
cards.text: Mike's Mobile offers dryer vent cleaning services in Antioch, Ca. Call today for an appointment!

cards.title: Titan Security Screen Doors
cards.text: Mike's Mobile has been offering 100% customizable security doors in Antioch for over 16 years. Our doors offer premium security and the the most mounting options around. The fit and finish on these doors is unparalleled by other manufacturers.

cards.title: Viewguard Security Screen Doors
cards.text: The Viewguard is our best selling security door for a reason. The Viewguard looks like a screen door but is actually high tensile strength stainless steel woven into a fine mesh. It provides maximum security yet gives you a clear view of the outdoors without compromising the style or appearance of your home. It is a security screen door that no bars and no busy designs; it offers quiet operation and will never rust.

cards.title: TRU-View Security Screen Doors
cards.text: The Tru-View Security Screen Door has heavy gauge extruded aluminum for long lasting durabililty. Available in Bronze anodized, white or a host of custom colors, this door is sure to compliment your home. A keyed lock with inside thumb turn, steel strike plate and a deep extending dead bolt makes this lock virtually pick proof.

cards.title: Sliding Security Doors
cards.text: Enjoy the cool night air while sleeping in peace, quiet and safety. Good looks, ease of use and legitimate security really make our sliding security doors stand apart.

cards.title: Vista Quick Escape Security Window Screens
cards.text: Vista Quick Escape Security Window Screens offer the ultimate in window security with good looks to match. As an added bonus, our screens block out an average of 60% of the sun's harmful ultraviolet rays to make your home more comfortable during the summer months.

cards.title: Vista Fixed Security Window Screens
cards.text: Vista Fixed Security Screens are the perrfect solution to cover and protect non-opening windows. Our security screens can be installed on the interior or exterior and feature a hidden fastening system. With many frame options to choose from they blend in with any architecture. Applications include: Day care centers, psychiatric and detox centers, government buildings, military installations, schools, adult care facilities and residential homes.

cards.title: Window Screen Repair
cards.text: With more than 16 years in service, Mike's Mobile is Antioch's premier window screen repair and replacement contractor!

cards.title: Solar Screens
cards.text: Maintain your existing screens or upgrade your home with Solar Screens! Solar Screens can block out up to 90% of the sun’s harmful UV rays and keep the inside of your home 15 degrees cooler.

cards.title: Sliding Screen Doors
cards.text: Tired of that old sliding door that always falls off the track? Call us for a built-on-site, custom sliding screen door with custom components!

cards.title: Swinging Screen Doors
cards.text: Want a swinging screen door but can't find one that fits? No problem? At Mike's Mobile Screens all of our swinging screen doors are custom sized and installed for you!

cards.title: Retractable Screen Doors
cards.text: Our disappearing screen doors fit inside your door frame for a clean, finished look.

cards.title: Pet Doors
cards.text: After we install your new, custom pet door you will be wondering why you didn’t call us sooner!

cards.title: Garage Screen Doors
cards.text: Going from garage to an airy, pest–free space is a snap and takes just seconds with a Lifestyle Garage Screen Door!

cards.title: Retractable Patio Awnings
cards.text: Need a retractable awning in the Antioch area? Call Mike's mobile today!

cards.title: Drop Roll Sunscreens
cards.text: The Sunroll drop roll sunshade is there when you need it and gone when you don't!

description: Mike’s Mobile Screen & Chimney Service is a full service chimney sweep company in Walnut Creek, California. We service the entire Counties of Contra Costa as well as Alameda. You will get top-notch service no matter the size of the job. Chimney cleanings, inspections, repairs and accessories are no problem!

cards.title: Inspections
cards.text: Obstructions or blockages in your chimney can cause toxic fumes such as carbon monoxide to enter your home. Regular chimney inspections can greatly reduce the risk of chimney fires and carbon monoxide poisoning in your home. Every Mike's Mobile chimney inspection meet level 2 NFPA requirements and are performed by our csia and nfi trained technicians.

cards.title: Cleaning
cards.text: NFPA 211 standards dictate that residential properties should have an annual chimney cleaning and inspection. Mike's Mobile includes a free level 1 inspection with every sweep!

cards.title: Repairs
cards.text: Mike's Mobile is the premier chimney service company in the Danville / Walnut creek area. We are fully licensed, bonded and insured to tackle any chimney repair you may need.

cards.title: Accessories
cards.text: Mike’s Mobile Screen & Chimney Service offers damper chimney caps, replacement fireplace screens, hearth rugs and much more! Please ask our trained technicians any questions you have and they can recommend what will work best for your home.

cards.title: Masonry Services
cards.text: Mike’s Mobile Screen & Chimney Service offers masonry services of any scale. Please call us today for a quote! From tuck-pointing to full chimney rebuilds and more, we are able to help you for any masonry job.

cards.title: Dryer Vent Cleaning
cards.text: Mike's Mobile can help with your annual dryer vent cleaning in the Danville / Walnut Creek area.

cards.title: Titan Security Screen Doors
cards.text: Looking for a security door in the Danville or Walnut Creek area? Mike's Mobile offers the best security doors around, hands-down. Call today for a FREE quote!

cards.title: Viewguard Security Screen Doors
cards.text: The Viewguard is our top of the line security screen door. Full customizable, with many colors to choose from and a handsome frame surround, this door takes a traditional lock set to match the rest of your doors. The Viewguard door offers beauty, simplicity, and above all, absolute security.

cards.title: TRU-View Security Screen Doors
cards.text: Now you can let the cool breeze in and keep intruders out without compromising the appearance of your home. Finally, you can experience total security without resorting to bars or unsightly steel grills.

cards.title: Sliding Security Doors
cards.text: Our sliding security doors offer premium protection for your patio sliding door without any compromises. The 'screen' is actually a high strength stainless steel mesh that stops the bugs as well as the thugs so you can get the cool breeze without worry!

cards.title: Vista Quick Escape Security Window Screens
cards.text: Mike's Mobile quick escape security screens feature a high tensile strength stainless steel woven into a fine mesh. It provides maximum security yet gives you a clear view of the outdoors without compromising the style or appearance of your home.

cards.title: Vista Fixed Security Window Screens
cards.text: Mike's Mobile fixed security screens look like regular screens but offer premium security, good looks and 60% UV blockage

cards.title: Window Screen Repair
cards.text: Mike's Mobile is dedicated to providing our customers with a fast and affordable way to have their screens replaced. If you're in the Danville or Walnut Creek area call today and we can fix your screens on-site!

cards.title: Solar Screens
cards.text: Block the heat on sunny windows and save money on your electricity bill! Mike's Mobile can make your home more comfortable and energy-efficient with solar screen window converings.

cards.title: Sliding Screen Doors
cards.text: Need a sliding screen door in the Danville / Walnut Creek area? Call Mike's Mobile, we can build you a custom sliding screen door that works perfect!

cards.text: Longing for that old-fashioned simplicity of a swinging screen door? We have many styles and colors to choose from and each of our doors are custom-sized for a perfect fit on your home.

description: Mike's Mobile is Oakland's premier, full service chimney company. If there are issues regarding your chimney or fireplace we can also do any repairs! We can take any size job from start to finish. We are licensed, bonded and insured to provide peace of mind.

cards.title: Inspections
cards.text: Click here to learn more about the different levels of chimney inspections. The internal portion of the inspection includes a video scan of the chimney, which includes the firebox, smoke chamber, smoke shelf, chimney flue and damper assembly. Our technicians are extermely meticulous, looking for obstructions, cracks in the clay tile liner, absence of liner, signs of moisture or anything else that would make the chimney unsafe for use.

cards.title: Cleaning
cards.text: According to the NFPA, your chimney should have an annual cleaning and safety inspection. This is vital to your chimney and your home’s health. All of our technicians are certified and use the CSIA standards for chimney cleaning and inspections.

cards.title: Repairs
cards.text: Mike’s Mobile Screen & Chimney offers chimney repairs on any scale. From minor repairs to major overhauls, you can count on us! Often times minor repairs can be done on-site after the inspection / cleaning and sometimes it requires a scheduled appointment.

cards.title: Accessories
cards.text: Mike’s Mobile Screen & Chimney Service can take care of any custom chimney or fireplace accessories you may need. We can supply the parts and also install them for you!

cards.title: Masonry Services
cards.text: Mike's Mobile is Oakland's premier masonry contractor. We specialize in the following: brick, block, stone, veneer, fireplace face/hearth, chimney stack rebuild, hardscapes, tuck-pointing, waterproofing and more!

cards.title: Dryer Vent Cleaning
cards.text: You probably clean your dryer’s lint trap, but did you know lint and other debris get past that screen and clogs the dryer vent itself? Clogged dryer vents can cause many issues including fire, carbon monoxide accumulation, extra wear to clothing, excessive energy use, and mold growth.

cards.title: Titan Security Screen Doors
cards.text: Mike's Mobile has been Oakland's premier security door dealer for 16 years and running. Our steel doors are hand-made and fully-customizable for adding security but also a personal touch to make your home unique.

cards.title: Viewguard Security Screen Doors
cards.text: There is a reason the Viewguard Security Screen Door is our best selling security screen door. WIth it's heavy-duty extruded aluminum framing and stainless steel woven security mesh, you get the airflow and exellent visibility. The wide frame and stainless steel security mesh provides top of the line security protection.

cards.title: TRU-View Security Screen Doors
cards.text: Tru-View™ security screen doors incorporate the latest advances in high tensile strength materials and construction. The stainless steel marine grade mesh screen optimizes airflow, and maximizes security. Strength and beauty in perfect harmony.

cards.title: Sliding Security Doors
cards.text: Our sliding security doors offer premium protection for your patio sliding door without compromising anything. The 'screen' is actually a high strength stainless steel mesh that stops the bugs as well as the thugs so you can get the cool breeze while still getting a peaceful nights rest.

cards.title: Vista Quick Escape Security Window Screens
cards.text: Vista quick escape security screens are an ideal solution to cover and protect your windows. Our security screens come in a variety of colors and feature a concealed fastening system and blends with any architecture.

cards.title: Vista Fixed Security Window Screens
cards.text: Mike's Mobile fixed Vista security screens feature a high tensile strength stainless steel woven into a fine mesh. It provides maximum security yet gives you a clear view of the outdoors without compromising the style or appearance of your home.

cards.title: Window Screen Repair
cards.text: Mike's Mobile offers a fulle service mobile screen shop in the Oakland area. Call today to keep the bugs out and let the breeze in!

cards.title: Solar Screens
cards.text: If you need solar screens in the Oakland area, call Mike's Mobile today for a FREE estimate. We build solar screens on-site for a perfect fit!

cards.title: Sliding Screen Doors
cards.text: Tired of that old sliding screen door that always falls off the track? Call us for a built-on-site, custom sliding screen door with all metal components!

cards.title: Swinging Screen Doors
cards.text: Longing for that old-fashioned simplicity of a swinging screen door but don't have the time to deal with it? Call Mike's Mobile to measure and install your custom swinging screen door today!

cards.title: Retractable Screen Doors
cards.text: Need a disappearing screen door in the Oakland area? One call to Mike's Mobile and we'll get a door that's custom fit and colored to match your home.

cards.title: Pet Doors
cards.text: Need a little freedom for your pet? Our Pride pet doors are here to help!

cards.title: Garage Screen Doors
cards.text: Need more living area in your home? Turn your garage into a cool and bright room with a Lifestyle Garage Screen Door

cards.title: Retractable Patio Awnings
cards.text: Need an awning in the Oakland area? Mike's Mobile offers the highest quality Sunesta retractable awnings!

cards.title: Drop Roll Sunscreens
cards.text: There when you need it and gone when you don't, our Sunroll sunscreens offer the perfect solution to beat the heat!

description: Whether you're a real estate agent, prospective homebuyer, property manager or new homeowner, Mike's Mobile Chimney Service can give you peace of mind when it comes to your fireplace.

cards.title: Inspections
cards.text: Mike's Mobile is the premier chimney service company in the Modesto area. We are the only company that offers same-day digital inspections reports. Contact us today for a level 1, 2 or 3 chimney inspection!

cards.title: Cleaning
cards.text: Mike's Mobile is the leading chimney service company in the Modesto area. We offer same-day digital inspection reports and can quote for any repairs needed.

cards.title: Repairs
cards.text: Mike's Mobile is Modesto's premier chimney service company. We offer competitive rates with industry leading repairs. We are fully licensed, bonded and insured for peace of mind.

cards.title: Accessories
cards.text: If you need fireplace or chimney related parts or accessories in Modesto, call Mike's Mobile today! We offer custom accessories and also installation services.

cards.title: Masonry Services
cards.text: Mike's Mobile is Modesto's premier masonry contractor. Whether it's new construction or masonry repair, call us today for a FREE quote!

cards.title: Dryer Vent Cleaning
cards.text: Our dryer vent cleaning removes lint, clogs and debris to ensure proper airflow. Mike's Mobile's cleaning services not only protect you from hazards such as fire and carbon monoxide buildup, but also provide many added benefits such as energy savings, shorter drying cycles and less damage to clothing.

cards.title: Titan Security Screen Doors
cards.text: Want something truly custom and unique for your home? Mike's Mobile security doors are auto-cad designed for tight tolerances but are ultimately hand-made which means a 100% customizable door with a fit and finish that exceeds any other security door.

cards.title: Viewguard Security Screen Doors
cards.text: Now you can let the cool breeze in and keep intruders out without compromising the appearance of your home. You can experience total security without resorting to bars or unsightly steel grills of traditional security doors. The Viewguard security screen door offers quiet operation and will never rust. Strength and beauty in perfect harmony.

cards.title: TRU-View Security Screen Doors
cards.text: The Tru-View looks like a screen door but is actually high tensile strength stainless steel woven into a fine mesh. It provides securitybut gives you a clear view of the outdoors without compromising the style or appearance of your home. A security screen door that no bars and no busy designs, a simple looking outer frame with a specialized stainless steel mesh!

cards.title: Sliding Security Doors
cards.text: Ever wanted to sleep with your patio door open so you can get the breeze and fresh air all night? Now you can with our sliding security doors. The stainless steel mesh looks like a screen but offers premium security with maximum airflow and also cuts UV rays by 60%.

cards.title: Vista Quick Escape Security Window Screens
cards.text: Want security but the jail-bar look isn't for you or your home? Mike's Mobile has you covered! Our security screens come in a variety of frame colors and the 'screen' is actually a high-tensile strength stainless steel weave. It offers great looks, superior protection and even blocks 60% of the sun's UV rays for those hot summers.

cards.title: Vista Fixed Security Window Screens
cards.text: Say no to the old school jail-bar iron bars over windows for security. The Vista fixed security screens offer better looks, better security and will never rust. On top of all that he stainless mesh cuts out 60% of UV rays to help your home stay cool for those hot Modesto summers.

cards.title: Window Screen Repair
cards.text: Mike's Mobile measures, builds and installs your screens at your ​home or business​. Most screens can be ​fixed​ in one ​visit​, ​sav​ing​​ ​you valuable time. Call Mike's Mobile for Modesto screen repair!

cards.title: Solar Screens
cards.text: Modesto gets HOT in the summer but don't worry, Mike's Mobile can cool you down! Our solar screens are built on-site for a perfect fit and can block up to 90% of the suns UV rays while still letting light into your home. Call today for a FREE estimate!

cards.title: Sliding Screen Doors
cards.text: Mike's Mobile Screen and Chimney Service builds custom sliding screen doors in the modesto area. Have pets? No problem, we can build a sliding screen door with pet proof screen that's covered with a warranty!

cards.title: Swinging Screen Doors
cards.text: One call and we can get you a custom sized swinging screen door installed on your home. Add solar screen for added protection against pets and the sun's UV rays.

cards.title: Retractable Screen Doors
cards.text: Want to stop the bugs but don't want a door in the way? Mike's Mobile disappearing screen doors are there when you need them and gone when you don't!

cards.title: Pet Doors
cards.text: If you like a trusted name on your products, the Pride Pet Door is the way to go. Pride offers sturdy, reliable products, and some of our customers have used this pet door with multiple pets for over 20 years!

cards.title: Garage Screen Doors
cards.text: The Lifestyle Garage Screen Door will turn your garage into an airy and pest-free space in a snap!

cards.text: Increase your home’s livable area and create the perfect day with Retractable Patio Awnings. An overhead retractable awning for your patio or decks not only offers shade, but also beauty and value to your home.

cards.text: The Sunroll Retractacble Screen provides you with sun protection, privacy and ease of use. A press of a button can transform your living space.

description: Mike's Mobile Chimney Service serves the areas of Vallejo and Napa. We are a full service company providing chimney sweeps, chimney inspections and chimney repairs. Our chimney repair service covers everything from small repairs to complete rebuilds.

cards.title: Inspections
cards.text: Mike's Mobile is the premier chimney service company in the Napa / Vallejo area. Utilizing a full video scan, Mike's Mobile is the only company that offers same-day digital inspections reports. Contact us today for a professional chimney inspection!

cards.title: Cleaning
cards.text: Our chimney sweeps always include a free Level I inspection. This will ensure a complete service and inform you of anything that needs attention. The NFPA (National Fire Protection Agency) recommends an annual cleaning and safety inspection.

cards.title: Repairs
cards.text: Call Mike’s Mobile for Chimney Sweep services today! We are a full service chimney company in Vacaville, Vallejo, and Napa that can handle any repair your chimney may need. From minor repairs to full rebuilds, we have you covered.

cards.title: Accessories
cards.text: Mike’s Mobile Screen & Chimney Service offers a full line of custom chimney accessories to fit your needs! Need ti installed? We can do that too!

cards.title: Masonry Services
cards.text: Mike’s Mobile Screen & Chimney Service offers masonry services of any scale. Call us today for a quote! From tuck-pointing to full chimney rebuilds, we are able to help.

cards.title: Dryer Vent Cleaning
cards.text: Need that dryer vent cleaning crossed off your honey-do list? Mike's Mobile can help! Call us today!

cards.title: Titan Security Screen Doors
cards.text: Heavy Duty Security Doors have a heavy gauge steel frame with a galvanized, perforated steel backing. Computer designed but hand-made, these doors offer tight tolerances to keep the bugs out but are fully customizable for a look to make your home unique.

cards.title: Viewguard Security Screen Doors
cards.text: The Viewguard security screen door looks like a screen door but is actually high tensile strength stainless steel woven into a fine mesh. It provides secure protection and gives you a clear view of the outdoors without compromising the style or appearance of your home. It will never rust and has a full length gear hinge for quiet, smooth operation. Strength and beauty in perfect harmony.

cards.title: TRU-View Security Screen Doors
cards.text: If you want security but don't want it to look like you live in a jail, the Tru-View is the door for you. WIth it's heavy-duty extruded aluminum framing and stainless steel woven security mesh, you get the airflow and exellent visibility.

cards.title: Sliding Security Doors
cards.text: Ever wanted to get a breeze through your patio door while you sleep? With our sliding security doors, now you're able to! The stainless steel mesh looks like a screen but offers maximum airflow, unbarred visibility and premium security.

cards.title: Vista Quick Escape Security Window Screens
cards.text: Mike's Mobile security window screens provide superior protection against intruders, UV rays and other unwanted pests. The screens are custom made to match your existing window style, color, and type so they add to the curb appeal of your home. They are mounted directly to your window for a seamless look and most importantly give offer easy access through the window in case of an emergency.

cards.title: Vista Fixed Security Window Screens
cards.text: Mike's Mobile can help put your mind at ease by providing real security against burglars, vandals and forces of nature with our stainless steel security screens. The 'screen' is actually a high strength stainless steel mesh that offers the ultimate in protection while stopping bugs and cutting UV rays by 60%.

cards.title: Window Screen Repair
cards.text: Mike's Mobile is the premier window and door screen service in the Napa / Vallejo area. Because there​'​s no such thing as a standard size in the screening world, almost all screens are custom​-​sized and need to be built to tight tolerances. With our mobile service, we can customize hard​-​to​-​fit screens on-site.

cards.title: Solar Screens
cards.text: If you're in the Napa or Vallejo area call Mike's Mobile for solar screens on your windows and doors. Solar screens can reduce inciming UV rays by 80-90% and reduct inside temperature by 15 degrees or more!

cards.text: Want a patio sliding screen door that simply just works without falling off the track? Call Mike's Mobile today for a custom built, all-metal, sliding screen door.

cards.title: Swinging Screen Doors
cards.text: Stop the bugs and get the breeze with the old-fashioned simplicity of a swinging screen door. Our swinging screen doors have custom sizes and many colors and options to choose from.

cards.text: Want the breeze without the hassle? Call Mike's Mobile and get one of our disappearing screen doors today!
